LanguageData.ST_BatteryCharger_InsertDesc: Insert a battery into the charger for recharging. Nuclear batteries cannot be recharged.
LanguageData.ST_BatteryCharger_EjectAllDesc: Eject all batteries from the charger and drop them nearby.
LanguageData.ST_BatteryCharger_CannotChargeNuclear: Nuclear batteries cannot be recharged. They generate power through radioactive decay.
LanguageData.ST_BatteryCharger_AlreadyCharging: That battery is already in the charger.
LanguageData.ST_BatteryCharger_AlreadyFull: That battery is already fully charged.
LanguageData.ST_BatteryCharger_NoPawnAvailable: No available colonist to haul the battery.
